reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from 2 weeks at the Christos - the location of these apartments is fantastic, right on the waterfront and about 3 minutes walk from the bars & restaurants.
reviews.title: they were OK

likes.disliked: — no shower/ toilet facilities on the last day

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms at Christos vary in size immensley - some are pretty good, others (like ours- room 7) are pretty small - we couldnt open the patio doors fully as the bed was in the way, and couldnt open the wardrobe fully as the bed was in the way, the bathroom door couldn't be opened more than half way, as it would hit the sink (you get the picture!) - the room was adequate for our needs and the bathroom even had a shower curtain ! (the bathroom flooded every time we had a shower, but thats why they all have plugholes in the floor - I've never had a Greek bathroom that didnt flood.
reviews.title: A good example of a Greek apartment
